content:
Consistency is key, and it's great that you're finding a rhythm that works for you. Sticking to the Earl Grey for now is perfectly fine, and you can always experiment with other flavors later on.

It's interesting that you've adjusted your tea break time to 2:30 pm. Sometimes, making small changes to our routine can have a big impact. Having your tea break a bit earlier might be helping you tackle the post-lunch slump and stay focused during the afternoon.

Do you find that you're more productive or energized after your 2:30 pm tea break? And are there any other habits or routines that you're incorporating into your daily schedule to help you stay focused and motivated?
